home.title: Homepage
home.description: Nimara's headless architecture, built on Saleor, provides a flexible, cost-effective solution for online businesses. It’s ready to deploy with minimal setup, supports seamless integration of new providers, and features an intuitive UI for easy storefront customization and management.

common.product-added: Product has been added to your bag.

cart.discount-removed: Your discount code has been removed
cart.max-quantity: Sorry, the maximum quantity you can order is {maxQuantity}.

site.checkout-out-store: Check out our store and find something that suits you best.

address.sorry-you-dont-have-any-addresses: Sorry, you don't have any addresses yet.
address.delete-address-description: Are you sure you want to delete this address? You won't be able to undo this action.

payment.title: Payment
payment.no-payment-methods: Sorry, you don’t have any payment methods yet.

order-confirmation.heading: Your order has been successfully placed
order-confirmation.paragraph:
We are glad to take care of your order!

Check your inbox to find the receipt and further instructions.

form-validation.email-required: Email is required to create an account.
form-validation.min-length-password: Password should contain at least {minimum} signs.
form-validation.reset-password-required-email: Type the email to reset the password.

checkout-errors.QUANTITY_GREATER_THAN_LIMIT: Sorry, the maximum quantity you can order has been reached.

payment.default: Something went wrong with the payment. Please try again or <link>contact with us</link>.

auth.newEmail: Email is used by other user.

account.deleteAccount: There was an error while sending the email.

checkout.codeNotApplicable: Code is not applicable to this checkout.
checkout.couldNotProcess: Sorry, we couldn’t process your discount code. Please try again.
checkout.couldNotRemove: Sorry, we couldn’t remove your discount code. Please try again.

stock-errors.products-unavailable: Sorry, the products you want to buy are unavailable
stock-errors.products-message: Products you’ve wanted to buy are unavailable for your shipping location or they’re out of stock. Contact us for more info.
stock-errors.some-of-products-unavailable: Sorry, some of the products are unavailable
stock-errors.some-of-products-message: The product you’ve wanted to buy is unavailable for your shipping location or it’s out of stock. Contact us for more info.

auth.sign-in-error: Sorry, wrong email or password. Please try again.
auth.create-account-agreement: By clicking “Create account” you agree with <termsOfUse>{termsOfUse}</termsOfUse> and <privacyPolicy>{privacyPolicy}</privacyPolicy> of Nimara Store
auth.create-account-verify: Your account needs to be verified first. Check your email and click activation link to activate your account.
auth.confirm-account-fail: An error occurred while confirming your account.
auth.confirm-account-success: Great! Your account is now active.
auth.reset-password-description: Please type the email address used to create the account you'd like to access.
auth.reset-password-link-sent-description: If the account with the email address you've provided exists, you'll receive the message with a password reset link.
auth.set-up-new-password-error: Couldn't set up a new password.
auth.set-up-new-password-success: You can now log in using your new password.
auth.by-creating-account: By creating an account, you can track your orders more effectively and save your addresses and payment methods.
auth.you-wont-have-access: You won't have access to your order history or any special deals we've got for you.
auth.too-much-time-has-passed: Too much time has passed to change your email. Please try again or contact our support team for assistance.

account.you-need-to-confirm-your-new-email: You need to confirm your new email
account.confirm-new-email-description: We've sent you the confirmation link to your new email. The link will be active for next {timeRemaining} hours.
account.confirm-new-email-button: Ok, I'll confirm my new email
account.delete-account-and-all-your-data-permane: Delete account and all your data permanently
account.delete-account-description: After deleting your account, all your data and other account details will no longer be stored in Nimara Store.
account.delete-account-modal-description: Once you delete the account all your saved and personal data will be no longer stored in Nimara Store.
account.in-case-of-any-questions: In case of any questions, <contactUs>{contactUs}</contactUs> or read our <privacyPolicy>{privacyPolicy}</privacyPolicy>.
account.i-want-permanently-delete-my-account-and: I want to permanently delete my account and all data from Nimara Store
account.confirm-account-deletion-description: You will receive an email message with a link confirming the deletion of your account.
account.your-account-has-been-permanently-delete: Your account has been permanently deleted
account.payment-method-delete-info: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method? You won’t be able to undo this action.

order.sorry-you-dont-have-any-orders: Sorry, you don’t have any orders yet.

footer.demo-version: <link>This is the demo version of Nimara Store.</link>
